pages.text: The shrines on the peaks seems to hold a copy of a blueprint on making wind-powered golems. Indeed, these golems seems far different from others of its kind, as it appears to require outside energy to function.
Right click the center Jade Block with an Animation Core.
When created the golem will be inactive, immobile and somehow unable to be harmed. The golem requires power from a block called a Resonance Crystal to function.
To activate the golem, one should register the golem by left-clicking the crystal on it. Once registered, the crystal must then be powered by a Wind Blower, blowing wind on it.
When powered, the crystal will activate the golem. Should the crystal be broken or deactivated, the golem will shut down and be inactive once more.
The golem can only Follow or Stand By, it cannot Wander like other servants. If damaged, the golem can be repaired using Jade or Jade Blocks.
